entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
